testcase.name: testCorrectPotionsClass
testcase.system-out:
You have chosen to attend Diviniation class. Your teacher is Professor Trelawney. This class will use your cunning stat.
Today you are given a written exam to complete. You must answer the questions correctly to pass.
Are you ready to begin (yes/no)
Great let's get started!
Question number 1: What kind of animal brought Harry his first letter from Hogwarts? That is correct! Get ready for the next question.
Question number 2: What is the ability to talk to snakes called? That is correct! Get ready for the next question.
Question number 3: What broke Ron's car after he flew it to Hogwarts? That is correct! Get ready for the next question.
Question number 4: Which Tri-wizard tournament contestant died? That is correct! Get ready for the next question.
Question number 5: Who died at the Ministry of Magic offices? That is correct! Get ready for the next question.
Question number 6: Who killed Dumbledore? That is correct! Get ready for the next question.
Question number 7: Which deathly hollows is represented by a stick figure? Wrong answer. Better luck with the next question!
Congratulations! You have passed your written exam! You will gain a bonus of +1 to your cunning stat for the day.
